author: leggat
body:
The update is being made for normalisation purposes when we need to compare the trend plots with references.

The Fill method is now used instead of the setBinContent, and because of this the filling has been change from lumiSec/10 to lumiSec-1 to maintain the same distributions as those originally observed.
title: Updating pixel phase 1 ROC trend plots to use TProfiles instead of TH1F
